abilityDesc: If the wielder deals Follow-Up DMG, gains Above the Stars effect. Above the Stars: Increases Follow-Up Attack DMG by [$_1] for 3 Cycles. If the wielder has a Shield, gains Beyond the Stars effect. Beyond the Stars: Increases Magic PWR by [$_2] for 4 Cycles. If both Above the Stars and Beyond the Stars are active, the wielder's Adaptive ATK is increased by [$_3].
